name: Socket Proxy
author: 11notes
description: A secure Docker socket proxy that provides controlled access to the Docker API. Essential for applications that need Docker integration while maintaining security by exposing only specific Docker API endpoints with read-only access.

form_fields.label: Proxy Volume Path
form_fields.hint: Path to the docker volume used to expose the proxy socket

form_fields.label: Docker Socket Path
form_fields.hint: Path to the actual docker socket

form_fields.label: Proxy UID
form_fields.hint: The UID used to run the proxy parts

form_fields.label: Proxy GID
form_fields.hint: The GID used to run the proxy parts

form_fields.label: Container User
form_fields.hint: User to run the container as (must be root for Docker socket access)

form_fields.label: Enable Debug Mode
form_fields.hint: Activate debug option for container image and app
